items.key: @@admin = 1 or ma_quyen in (select ma_quyen from crmquyennsd where user_id = @@userID) and status = '1'

(@@admin = 1 or patindex('%,' + rtrim(name) + ',%', (select ',' + replace(restrict_users,' ','') + ',' from userinfo2 where id = @@userID and restrict_yn = '1')) <> 0) and admin = 0 and user_yn = 1 and status = '1'
items.check: (@@admin = 1 or patindex('%,' + rtrim(name) + ',%', (select ',' + replace(restrict_users,' ','') + ',' from userinfo2 where id = @@userID and restrict_yn = '1')) <> 0) and admin = 0 and user_yn = 1

action.text: if exists(select 1 from @@sysDatabaseName..userinfo2 where name = @name) begin select id from @@sysDatabaseName..userinfo2 where name = @name return end
